title: Textile, 1840s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 89 x 66 cm (35 1/16 in. x 26 in.)

description: Group of natural scale flowers filling and falling over full width of fabric including rose, tulip, fichsia, morning glory. Muted colors on a tan background. Height of repeat: 41 cm (16 1/8")
